categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Blue Six was a pilot in the Rebel Alliance's Blue Squadron and Blue Five's wingmate. During the ambush on Ral's Run, Blue Six's T-65 X-wing starfighter was damaged and the pilot tried to escape back into hyperspace.
Blue Six appears in the opening story for Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game sourcebook Stay on Target.
